steps.conclusion: None. All constraints are met: correct language, inclusion of the exact topic 'International Law', titles have no level/joiner words, each title has ≤5 words, single-topic titles, proper english_title mirroring title, is_language_course=false for all, and icons start with 'tabler-'. No jurisdiction omissions apply since all are global law subjects.
None observed. Titles and metadata conform precisely to the stated rules.

Could broaden coverage with additional relevant international law subfields (e.g., International Criminal Law, Law of the Sea, International Trade Law, International Environmental Law, International Arbitration) while keeping titles ≤5 words. This would provide more choice without violating rules.
